name: All Closed Issue
query:
SELECT
    `tabIssue`.tcil as "TCIL",
    `tabIssue`.udise as "UDISE",
    `tabIssue`.issue_type as "Issue Type",
    `tabIssue`.school_name as "School_name",
    `tabIssue`.block as "Block",
    `tabIssue`.district as "District",
    `tabIssue`.issue_creation_date_and_time as "Issue Opening date and Time",
    `tabItem Detail`.item as "Item Name",
    `tabItem Detail`.manufactrurer as "Manufacturer",
    `tabItem Detail`.serial_no as "Items Serial number",
    `tabItem Detail`.oem_email_address as "OEM email"
    from 
    `tabIssue` INNER JOIN `tabItem Detail`
    ON
    `tabIssue`.name=`tabItem Detail`.parent
    WHERE
    `tabIssue`.status="Closed";
